name: Maasai Mara
description:
This game was originally made for the Brackeys Game Jame 2021.1. However, due to the winter storm in Texas, we were unable to submit in time. We have worked past the deadline to fully realize the game's potential. Enjoy!

  • Click the screen to move the herd's circle of influence
  • Press 1 to use the "Scatter" ability
  • Press 2 to use the "Stampede" ability
  • Press R to reset the scene
  • Hold Esc for 3 seconds to exit the application

Credit:

Programming - metakazz

Music and SFX - Geordie Alexander

Art - Ian Quarles

Special Thanks to Keith Turkowski !
